MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the DG9 postcode area of Stranraer. This is causing flickering power to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4:51pm. Our engineers are on their way to the local area and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 7PM. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:01 PM on Sunday, 22 November 2020
